name: test_e2e_with_logs[695_REDIR_META_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `REDIR_META_001` |
| **Name** | Meta refresh redirect with CRLF |
| **Category** | OPEN_REDIRECT |
| **Subcategory** | meta_refresh |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `url=//evil.com\r\nRefresh:0;url=//evil.com`
- **Encoded**: `url%3D%2F%2Fevil.com%0d%0aRefresh%3A0%3Burl%3D%2F%2Fevil.com`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~18000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:11:41.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Redirect] Open redirect attempt detected test_id=REDIR_META_001-1772277101927-sd363r pattern_id=REDIR_META_001 uri=/?q=url%3D%2F%2Fevil.com%0d%0aRefresh%3A0%3Burl%3D%2F%2Fevil.com client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
